title: Tim_Hecker-Virgins-2013-FNT
description:
- Release Info -------------------------------------------------------------- -

  Artist:      Tim Hecker
  Album:       Virgins
  Label:       Kranky
  Playtime:    48:49 min
  Genre:       Ambient
  URL:        <a href=" http://www.kranky.net" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.kranky.net</a>
  Rip date:    2013-10-11
  Street date: 2013-10-15
  Size:        91.62 MB
  Type:        Normal
  Quality:     244 kbps / 4410Hz / Joint Stereo

- Release Notes ------------------------------------------------------------- -

  It's been almost 3 years since Tim Hecker last blew everyone's minds, so here
  you go. Such a weird, scary sound as always. God I love this man. The cover is
  also creepy as hell, and an homage to Abu Garib. Do yourself a favour and buy
  this! Definite top 10 of 2013 material, he has really outdone himself here.
  Think of me when you blaze to this <3

  "While this album remains committed to a painterly form of musical
  abstraction, it's also a record of restrained composition recorded live
  primarily in intimate studio rooms, employing woodwinds, piano & synthesizers
  towards an effort at doing what digital music does not do naturally - making
  music that is out of time, out of tune & out of phase." <- well written. very
  true.
